title: Unveiled: Daisy Bates and Johnny Cash
overview: "Unveiled" celebrates the enduring legacies of two of Arkansas's most iconic figures. Daisy Bates, who courageously led the fight for civil rights, and Johnny Cash, whose music captured the soul of America, are immortalized in bronze in the U.S. Capitolâ€™s National Statuary Hall. Explore the profound impact of their lives on history, from their humble beginnings to their lasting influence.
